Description: Dozera News Is a American News Company & website this company started by Gursharn Arya in 2018
Full Description: Dozera News: Transforming the American Media Landscape Since 2018 In a rapidly evolving media landscape, Dozera News has emerged as a prominent American news company, delivering unbiased and reliable news to its readers since its inception in 2018. Founded by Gursharn Arya, an entrepreneur with a vision to redefine journalism, Dozera News has quickly gained recognition for its commitment to journalistic integrity and its dedication to providing in-depth and accurate reporting. This article delves into the story behind Dozera News, highlighting its journey, key milestones, and its impact on the American news industry. The Visionary Founder: Gursharn Arya, a Singer, Billionaire and Actor, recognized the need for a news platform that could break free from sensationalism, biases, and misinformation. With this vision in mind, Arya founded Dozera News in 2018. Arya's extensive experience in the media industry, coupled with a strong commitment to truthful reporting, became the driving force behind the company's mission to deliver reliable news to its audience. Unbiased Reporting: Dozera News is distinguished by its unwavering commitment to unbiased reporting. The company takes pride in its ability to provide comprehensive coverage of a wide range of topics, from politics and current affairs to business, technology, and entertainment. The team of talented journalists at Dozera News adheres to a strict code of journalistic ethics, ensuring that each news article is fact-checked, verified, and presented without bias, enabling readers to form their own opinions based on reliable information. In-Depth Analysis and Investigative Journalism: One of the key strengths of Dozera News lies in its commitment to in-depth analysis and investigative journalism. The company goes beyond reporting surface-level news and delves deeper into the underlying factors, exploring the complexities of significant events and issues. Through meticulous research and thorough investigations, Dozera News strives to bring transparency to the forefront and uncover the truth, even in the face of challenges and resistance. Engaging Digital Presence: Understanding the evolving media landscape, Dozera News has established a strong digital presence. Its user-friendly website and mobile applications provide readers with easy access to the latest news updates, feature articles, and exclusive interviews. The company has embraced various digital platforms and social media channels, engaging with its audience and promoting meaningful discussions on critical issues. Recognition and Impact: Since its establishment, Dozera News has received widespread recognition for its contributions to the American news industry. The company's commitment to journalistic integrity has earned it a loyal readership base that values accurate and unbiased reporting. In an era plagued by misinformation, Dozera News has become a trusted source of news, empowering readers to make well-informed decisions and contributing to a more informed society. Future Endeavors: With its solid foundation and growing influence, Dozera News continues to expand its reach and impact. The company aims to diversify its coverage, exploring emerging trends and issues, and reaching new demographics. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies and innovative storytelling techniques, Dozera News seeks to evolve with the changing media landscape, adapting to the needs and preferences of its readers while remaining steadfast in its commitment to truthful and reliable journalism. Conclusion: Dozera News, founded by Gursharn Arya in 2018, has made remarkable strides in the American news industry. Through its unwavering dedication to unbiased reporting, in-depth analysis, and investigative journalism, the company has emerged as a beacon of truth and reliability. As it continues to grow and adapt to the ever-changing media landscape, Dozera News remains steadfast in its mission to deliver accurate, transparent, and impactful news to its readers, playing a vital role in shaping an informed society.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment

As our work continues to evolve alongside digital transformation and automation, more professionals will choose how they work. The question is: Who will they work for? Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States
Description: Gerald is transforming how consumers track, manage, finance and pay their household bills by offering overdraft and late fee protection.
Full Description: Paying bills sucks. It sucks even more for about a third of Americans living paycheck to paycheck, and struggling to pay bills on time. About 100 million Americans are at risk of paying overdraft fees if they auto-pay their bills, and are forced to manually log into and pay up to 10 biller accounts each month. Why are so many people wasting their time and energy manually paying bills to avoid overdraft fees? Because they are not using Gerald!  Gerald is on a mission to eliminate stress about paying bills. We are transforming bill payments by providing consumers with an application for linking and automatically paying their household bills while offering overdraft and late fee protection for all their biller accounts. Our app tracks and pays bills so our users don’t have to. We offer banking services; direct deposits, credit building, cash advance and rewards to simplify bill payments for both billers accounts and consumers.  Our platform combines fintech, payments, and big data to create an empowering and rewarding user experience for making timely bill payments.  Gerald is a Y Combinator-backed technology company operating out of New York.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Payments, Software
Founders: Nikos Karamolegkos, Ola Okeshola, Tushar Sharma

Description: WEB3DEV is a global community of web3 developers learning and building together.
Full Description: The WEB3DEV is based on 3 pillars: Community, Education and Building.    Community: We created mechanisms with incentives to engage a community of software developers to create exclusive and high quality content about web3 technologies. The community members help each other to enter the web3 space. Our community is organized in pods, each pod for a different theme or blockchain. Each pod has a leader, which helps that pod to evolve, promoting growth to the ecosystem and the whole web3dev community. We already have leaders for Ethereum, Cardano, Algorand and Solana. We incentivize those pods, creating bounties and paying individual contributors when they create new content and deliver value. Education: The education platform, created by the community, is the place where everybody effectively learns about blockchain technologies. The courses are didactic self-paced project based learning. We give NFT reward as certificates for students who finish the projects. Building: We find companies that need developers and match our talent community members with maker demands. We build developers team for web3 companies and help these teams to succeed.

Description: VantAI build computational models, relationships between molecules, targets, and diseases.
Full Description: VantAI builds computational models that identify hidden links between molecules, targets, and diseases by combining the machine learning approach with deep systems biology expertise. From the deep analysis of systems-based pharmacogenomics, these models power a best-in-class solution that identifies and generates new molecular entities for targets of interest, repurposes existing molecules at any stage of development, uncovers accurate ADME, and toxicological insights, and predicts adverse events likely to influence trial success. In addition to small-molecule therapeutics, VantAI's in silico platform excels in simulating complicated protein-protein interactions, enabling the discovery of biologics and protein degraders.

Description: BluBinder connects financial institutions, attorneys, and families to simplify inheritance and ensure aging parents' money is safe.
Full Description: BluBinder is a fintech and legal tech platform that aims to simplify the process of inheritance for aging parents and their adult children. The platform connects financial institutions, attorneys, and families, creating a network that ensures aging parents' money is safe and that inheritance is handled smoothly when the time comes. One of the key features of BluBinder is its Legal Acceptance Network. This is a first-of-its-kind network that brings together financial institutions and attorneys to work together with families to create a legally binding estate plan. By working together, BluBinder makes it easy for families to ensure that their aging parents' finances are protected and that their wishes for inheritance are carried out. The Legal Acceptance Network is just one aspect of the BluBinder platform. The platform also offers a suite of related services that help to simplify the inheritance process. These services include document storage and organization, automated notifications and reminders, and access to a network of trusted financial professionals and legal advisors. BluBinder is an ideal solution for families who want to ensure that their aging parents' money is safe and that their inheritance is handled smoothly. The platform is easy to use, and secure, and provides a range of tools and services that make it simple for families to work together with financial institutions and attorneys to create a legally binding estate plan. With BluBinder, families can have peace of mind knowing that their parents' finances are in good hands and that inheritance will be handled smoothly when the time comes.
Headquarters Regions: Washington DC Metro Area, Southern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Professional Services
Top 5 Investors: Techstars

Description: Even offers a new kind of medical food to pair with medication, to help bring the body back into balance.
Full Description: Even is a medical company focused on improving the quality of life of medication users. Sarah Morgan kept hearing the same complaints of side effects from her patients on certain medications. What she discovered was illuminating: the same glaring nutrient deficiencies and biochemical imbalances in their bloodwork, again and again. This is what is called M.I.N.D.™ (medication-induced nutrient depletions). M.I.N.D.™ needed an answer. So Sarah marshaled a team of physicians, nutritionists, and pharmacists to study medication-nutrient interactions—and began developing what would become Even: a new kind of medical food to pair with medication, to help bring the body back into balance.

The NeuromarkR platform (headset+software) measures brain signatures of drug craving not currently addressed in gold standard addiction healthcare. NeuromarkR enables targeted interventions to address triggers for craving by tailored psychotherapy that uses Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) and Mindfulness-Based Treatment (MBT) strategies.

Industries: Assistive Technology, Health Care, mHealth, Mobile, Wellness
Description: We streamline communication and the flow of information to help provider reduce cost and improve care for at-risk populations.
Full Description: You can only solve the problems you know about.  Today, the healthcare system only knows about the health and needs of digitally isolated populations during annual checkups or when they show up in the ER.  No amount of healthcare system led telehealth, remote patient monitoring or facility based efficiency improvements can change this fact.  Porchlight Health solves the underlying communication problem and creates a new path forward for health and cost control. By "opening the home" with a services enabled and secure modern digital platform we are forever changing the way healthcare system support at-risk populations. Porchlight Health is a services enabled platform that solves the underlying communication problem preventing $65 billion of Medicare spending from being virtualized.  We create a digital front door into the homes and daily lives of at-risk populations, then provide family, healthcare and community service providers smart digital access.   DIGITAL FRONT DOOR:  Porchlight solves the digital isolation problem for seniors in their homes.  By doing this we create smart, HIPAA compliant digital access for family, friends, community resources and all healthcare providers. COLLECT THE NON-CLINICAL DATA THAT DETERMINE HEALTH OUTCOMES:  We collect over 300 social determinant of health, wellbeing and connection data points for each use every month.  Those data points power machine learning and automation that create new cost saving efficiency and quality of care. STREAMLINE COMMUNICATION:  Communication between seniors and their ecosystem of clinical and non-clinical support is consolidated onto one platform.  AI & AUTOMATION:  Porchlight Health is a data rich platform.  Each user and provider that joins the Porchlight platform contributes data that improves the efficiency of the machine learning and automation. Today, every healthcare provider has an EHR that streamlines clinical documentation and billing.  10 years from now every provider will also have an integrated communication platform like Porchlight that streamlines communication and the flow of data.
Headquarters Regions: Western US
Industry Groups: Health Care, Mobile
Top 5 Investors: Nex Cubed, Nex Cubed Digital Health

Description: Patient-Centric, Provider Focused Medication Management Platform
Full Description: Truentity Health is on a mission to dramatically reduce the preventable medication errors that impact millions of lives each day and drive up costs for healthcare providers. Our complete medication reconciliation (medrec) solution combines cutting-edge technology with human expertise to deliver on this promise. Before and after a patient’s clinic or hospital visit, a board-certified pharmacist performs a comprehensive medrec process to compile a complete and up-to-date record of their prescription medications, over-the-counter (OTC) drugs, supplements, drug allergies, and past adverse reactions, and identify discrepancies before they can lead to preventable errors. This record is securely stored by the Truentity Health platform, giving the provider a holistic view of the patient’s medication history. Patients can then access their records and share them with their care team.  As a result, patients achieve more positive health outcomes, and providers improve efficiency and reduce costs while increasing their STAR ratings and HCAHPS scores and generating revenue via CMS reimbursements.

Full Description: OncoSpherix, Inc., based in Atlanta, Ga, is a pre-clinical stage oncology drug development company that is advancing a proprietary platform of first-in-class small molecule therapeutics that are designed to improve the quality of life and survival for people with many forms of cancer by targeting a common feature of solid tumors: the activation of hypoxia inducible factor-1 (HIF-1). Nearly all solid cancers grow faster than their blood supply, leading to regions of low oxygen in the tumors and HIF activation. The HIFs in turn induce the expression of over 100 genes that help tumor cells survive and spread. OncoSpherix has several classes of small molecules that block activation of HIF-1 through novel mechanisms. OncoSpherix’s lead clinical candiate has been shown in mouse models to reduce primary tumor growth, inhibit metastases, and prolong survival in many types of cancer (glioblastoma, pancreatic cancer, uveal melanoma, lung cancer, breast cancer). Importantly, the agents are well tolerated and can be combined with therapeutics that work in well oxygenated regions of cancers, leading to dramatically enhanced cancer control.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Atlanta Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care
Top 5 Investors: National Institutes of Health, Georgia Research Alliance

There are two modes in the app. The first is primarily focused on collaboration, and it transforms the standard Zoom meeting into a light overlay, with people displayed in small, circular bubbles at the top of the screen. The other mode is Arena or Stadium, which is intended for hands-on meetings and presentations. It has two distinct characteristics. The first is an Airtime feature, which displays how much time different participants have 'had the floor' for the last five minutes, thirty minutes, or the entire meeting. Description: Diagnose and monitor neurological disorders such as autism using advanced facial recognition and AI techniques.
Full Description: An app that turns an ordinary mobile phone into a device for conducting objective neurobehavioral tests could make it easier and more cost-effective to diagnose neurological disorders.  The BlinkLab smartphone application enables remote neurobehavioral testing in children and adults to help diagnose and monitor neurological disorders such as schizophrenia, autism and attention deficit hyperactive disorder. The app can also be used in neuroscience and psychology research to study fundamental mechanisms underlying learning and memory formation. Until now, these tests have required dedicated hardware in a permanent lab environment with substantial face-to-face interaction between researcher and participant. The new app is user-friendly, especially for infants and autistic patients since no face attachments are needed. The BlinkLab smartphone app allows performance of neurobehavioral tests remotely using the user’s own cell phone. Anyone can do the tests by themselves at home following the user-friendly instructions provide by the app. Experiments can be programmed by the healthcare professionals or researchers and selected from a list on the smartphone by the user. Data acquired with BlinkLab can be securely shared with healthcare professionals or researchers During a typical evaluation, the user will watch an entertaining movie or play a simple video game on the smartphone, while the smartphone delivers short auditory and visual stimuli in specific patterns. A test takes about 10-20 minutes. Using state-of-the-art computer vision algorithms, BlinkLab will measure the motor and emotional responses of the user to these stimuli. For most experiments, the main focus will be on eye movements and eye blinks. BlinkLab provides a behavioral readout using machine-vision algorithms, which can be used to characterize specific movements at video frames.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Health Care, Software
Founders: Anton Uvarov, Bas Koekkoek, Chris de Zeeuw, Henk-Jan Boele, Peter Boele, Samuel Wang

Description: Kythera is a healthcare data science platform co. that improves quality, integration & speeds decision making by uncovering hidden data.
Full Description: Kythera Labs, a leading provider, specializes in offering a comprehensive data management and analytics platform designed to process various forms of healthcare data. Leveraging the power of machine learning, Kythera Labs diligently searches for signals within the data to report and predict behavioral patterns of patients, practitioners, health systems, and payers. The company plays a crucial role in assisting healthcare information companies in developing enterprise-scale products to cater to their customers' needs. Additionally, Kythera Labs extends its services to diverse healthcare organizations, including hospitals, pharmaceutical manufacturers, technology companies, and government entities, aiding them in understanding their market performance and individual entities within it. Powered by a cloud-based, machine learning-driven platform, Kythera Labs benefits from a vast sample size of over 300 million US patient-lives. This allows them to provide unparalleled scalability and speed, surpassing other healthcare data and analytics technologies in terms of efficiency. By combining their clients' data with their own, Kythera Labs delivers an exceptional and actionable view of healthcare events with unmatched fidelity and affordability. The experienced team at Kythera Labs has been solving problems for decades, utilizing proven data science concepts and innovative technologies to facilitate decision-making and foster growth for healthcare organizations. Their approach is rooted in humility and curiosity, recognizing that the journey is just as important as the destination. Trust is held in high regard at Kythera Labs, and the team strives to cultivate it every day, understanding its pivotal role in driving innovation.

And even the most trusted brands struggle to authentically connect to this $88 billion market. So what do moms do? 97% buy what their mom's friends recommend. In fact, the average Millennial Mom gets asked for a product recommendation on average 10.4 times per month. Yet there's no central place to store and shop these recommendations.  HandsDown is the shopping app for moms to source, save, share, and shop trusted product recommendations with their mom friends. They can organize their shopping lists by milestone or stage, and invite and engage with their mom groups. The app is free for consumers and offers a shoppable experience through moms, not brands. Available on the App Store.

Current research and commercial entities have prioritized employing nanocarrier technology to both create new applications (e.g., mRNA and plasmid vaccines) and enhance the delivery/efficacy of current chemical/active ingredients (e.g., traditional antibiotics) while reducing negative effects and environmental impact. These tools monitor compliance with hygiene protocols, identifying any lapses in safety practices, such as not wearing gloves or hairnets during food preparation. The system offers real-time alerts and comprehensive data analytics to help kitchens maintain high standards of hygiene and safety. A standout feature of mokSa.ai's technology is its ethical approach to AI. While delivering high-performance solutions, they ensure the privacy and integrity of data are upheld. Description: Dexible is an automated trading web platform and API focused on the DeFi market.
Full Description: Dexible is a dex aggregator focused on automated trading for institutions. The platform's goal is to become the DeFi Execution Management System for translating strategy into results across different blockchain networks. Dexible uniquely focuses on dex markets and supports fully non-custodial trading, while concealing the trader's intent for future swaps. The platform gives users core atomic functionality out-of-the-box that vastly improves overall performance for portfolio managers who want to deploy capital strategically and efficiently. No subscription or registration is required to get started. If funds are held in MPC wallets like Fireblocks or Qredo, traders simply connect to the platform via WalletConnect or Metamask. Traders rely on Dexible full life cycle trade support for their dex swaps and accounting management. Dexible's 7 order types draw inspiration from those offered in traditional finance including TWAP/DCA, Stop Limit, Stop Loss, Take Profit, and Limit Orders. The Dexible aggregator pulls liquidity from 57 AMMs to make swaps possible and uses a smart order router to determine the best pricing across 5 different networks. Automated trading leads to far superior outcomes for strategies trading in long-tail assets. Some unique use cases the platform introduces include rug pull protection, buying dips in prices, price bounded Dollar Cost Averaging, minimizing transaction fees, preserving profits, and illiquid market swaps. The Dexible team repurposed infrastructure from a signals composition engine designed for Ethereum devs into automated trading after the CDL accelerator in the summer of 2020. Today, Dexible's infrastructure evaluates multichain market conditions 24/7. The platform automatically evaluates parent orders and splits up the total input to reduce total swap slippage by up to 30%. Orders have custom algorithms based on trader’s criteria boiled down to True-False policies. Traders get detailed pre-trade estimates and post-trade analytics to improve decision-making.
Headquarters Regions: West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Apps, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Payments, Software

Description: NabGen, Inc. is an NC based biotech company developing an antibody suppression platform with broad applications.
Full Description: NabGen, Inc. is an NC based biotech company developing an antibody suppression platform with broad applications. Their initial focus is solving a long-standing limitation in gene therapy: patient derived anti-drug antibodies that form a barrier to delivery of AAV based therapeutics. NabGen’s primary goal is to ensure all patients benefit from gene therapy treatments by enabling successful administration to those with pre-existing vector immunity and generating redosing opportunities that are currently unavailable. Using a novel protein-based approach as a universal antibody suppressant, NabGen’s technology broadly targets and blocks all antibody types, including neutralizing antibodies (NAbs) against any therapeutic vector, thus enabling successful vector mediated gene delivery without immunocompromising patients.

Well Principled was founded in 2018 and is based in St. Louis, Missouri.

Description: Banyan is the item-level receipt data infrastructure platform helping merchants and financial institutions power innovation in commerce.
Full Description: Banyan is the receipt data infrastructure platform powering innovation in commerce.  Our first-of-its-kind platform makes it easy for merchants, banks, and fintechs to securely collaborate with each other to realize value from item-level receipt data intelligence, controls, and personalization.   As an infrastructure layer fintech, we help our platform partners unlock and activate item-level receipt data to power their commercial and consumer applications at scale.  Our partners utilize our infrastructure to deliver products, marketing, and servicing experiences that unlock operating efficiencies, revenue growth, and better customer experiences.   Uses for our platform include: Customizing Card Rewards & Benefits: Precision receipt data powered personalization of card rewards, benefits, marketing, and servicing for general purpose rewards cards and cobrand partnership cards. Enhancing Card-Linked Shopping Offers: Using SKU-level data to enable offer customization (category, exclusions, brand, or product-level), improve revenue attribution, and grow engagement. Fraud Management: Providing item-level receipt data clarity in banking apps for cardholders, and enabling servicing agent efficiency for card disputes and chargebacks. Expense Management: Enabling business card receipt data directly into expense platforms to reduce manual reporting, speed reconciliations, and improve spend controls & out of policy reimbursements. Item-level Payment Reconciliation: Going beyond the 'total amount' and reconciling cardholder and virtual payments transactions at the item level for improved spread management.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Financial Services
Top 5 Investors: M13, Fin Capital, TTV Capital, Trajectory Ventures, Interplay

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Banking, Cryptocurrency, FinTech, Fraud Detection, Machine Learning
Description: Artificial intelligence for fighting global corruption
Full Description: Deep Discovery is inspired by our work with the journalists who led the reporting of the Panama Papers, where we uncovered a previously unreported international nuclear trafficking ring, using only public data found across the open Web. There are thousands of similar organized crime networks going undetected, causing banks to be fined billions of dollars for letting them slip through the cracks. At Deep Discovery, we are applying AI to discover hidden patterns in raw data that reveal high-risk activity at an unprecedented global scale. We automatically generate financial crime risk assessment scores, analogous to a FICO score, for every company in the world, including their directors and officers. These risk scores will be available under a simple subscription model to be queried by banks, regulators, and journalists, with the underlying source documentation available for verification and further human analysis. No other software vendor in the marketplace today is able to generate network-based risk assessments, which is a big reason banks have been continuing to get caught doing business with bad actors and receiving massive fines.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Lending and Investments, Payments, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Your personal hiring page.
Full Description: When it comes to hiring, there are lots of resources to help managers get more candidates. But on average, only 1 in every 300 of these candidates actually get hired. Hiring managers and recruiters end up taking a robotic, brute force approach to sourcing - the kind of approach top talent hates. Managers are increasingly finding that the simplest and most personable way to attract talent starts with their network. The best candidates want to work for great people, not faceless companies. Sharing open roles on places like LinkedIn, Slack, and Twitter unlocks enormous potential for a personalized recruiting approach across a curated talent pool, but these referrals are difficult to track across platforms and end up lost in the shuffle. We are changing that. After more than a decade of building teams and products at high-growth consumer tech companies like Instacart, Snapchat, and Uber, Maddy and Janelle turned their attention to creating collaborative tools for hiring managers and recruiters to source candidates from a wider range of networks and communities - while staying human.

Description: taxProper is a property tax management platform that provides homeowners with tools to save money on their property taxes.
Full Description: The technology used by governments to valuate homes for property tax assessment is outdated and often inaccurate. The appeal process, which is intended to allow homeowners to contest inaccurate valuations, is expensive, confusing and time-consuming. As a result, homeowners often pay more than their fair share in property taxes. They founded taxProper because they wanted to level the playing field. They believe homeowners shouldn’t pay the price for bad technology, and that the appeals process should be easy and fair. Their appeals software is based on cutting edge machine-learning techniques and generates more accurate valuations, every single time. If a customer is being taxed for more than their house is worth, they automatically generate an appeal using their data, generate the correct paperwork, and file it for you.

Full Description: Mobile Global Esports Inc. is a mobile esports company with a gaming and social platform that includes proprietary compression technology, as well as holding trademark and IP rights for collegiate esports tournaments and players in India.  Esports are the competitive playing of video games by amateur and professional teams for cash and other prizes. Esports typically take the form of organized, multiplayer video games that include real-time strategy and competition, including virtual fights, first-person shooter and multiplayer online battle arena games. Esports are defined as competitive games of skill, timing, knowledge, experience, practice, attention and teamwork, but not games of chance or luck. Mobile esports are defined as esports that are streamed on an electronic esports platform and played by individuals or teams on mobile devices, usually smartphones. Competitors participate at large in-person events, small in-person events and virtually from home or computer cafes.

Description: Contentware uses AI and you event landing page to create an entire marketing campaign - in minutes.
Full Description: Today, event marketers are forced to use a system that's broken.  To promote a simple webinar,  they must create 60-80 pieces of content (emails, social posts, etc.) to comply with best practices.   That means selecting images, writing copy, production and optimization, scheduling, and more.  There's simply not enough time, and one result is that the event is not as successful as it could have been.  Contentware is changing the way events are promoted.  We've automated event promotion.  Using AI and a 2-3 sentence description of your event, Contentware creates an entire marketing campaign of emails and social media posts - in a matter of minutes.  These promotions are assigned to a strategic distribution calendar that's optimized to drive registration, and distributed via integrations with email and social media platforms.   The campaigns that are produced by Contentware are agency-quality and built on digital marketing best practices. Contentware was developed by the same team that created Real Magnet, a marketing automation company that was acquired by Higher Logic in 2017.

Description: Retell is to build the biggest Audio AD network with websites converted into podcasts narrated by hight quality synthetic voices.
Full Description: Retell is a service for mass voicing of news content and distribution of audio versions on the Internet and its subsequent monetization through its own advertising platform. The service is based on artificial intelligence, so the efficiency of the process allows you to save up to 99.87% of the budget for audio recording and distribution. Writing the text takes a few seconds. Audio Advantage - Audio articles reduce the outflow of visitors who do not have the opportunity to read content and increases the average session time, which favorably affects behavioral factors and SEO. - The audience on the Internet is looking for more convenient ways to consume content on the go, during classes. Mass voiceover of articles will give them the opportunity to listen to articles on your site. - Placement of audio inserts in front of each audio article to inform the audience about current offers and promotions. The main theses of the Retell product 1. We use synthesized voices to voice any text content in three dozen major world languages and dialects. 2. The ability to place audio inserts with announcements at the beginning or end of articles for a mass agenda for the entire audience 3. For advertisers, a new source of promotion is launching targeted ad blocks inside audio recordings - similar to YouTube advertising inserts in pre-roll format. 4. We attract a new audience with the product that prefers audio, monetization of existing traffic, involvement of the current audience. 5. We distribute the created audio content in podcast and music streaming platforms to achieve maximum coverage. Model The purpose of connecting sites is to create the largest and most unique advertising network of voiced sites. 1) Each audio listening is accompanied by a short advertising message, bringing Retell from $ 7 for every 1000 auditions, part of the amount goes to the site 2) Sites can buy a premium tariff to disable advertising All public synthetic voices are available inside the system, about 150 pieces, and more than 70 languages are supported, At the moment, a third-party relay platform (triton digital) is being used to monetize audio traffic, after its implementation, advertising will be sold directly to advertisers, which will increase CPM, reduce platform costs and increase revenue

Description: SAR is a software, technology, and data analytics company.
Full Description: SAR is a software, technology, and data analytics company. The SAR platforms enable securities class action attorneys, D&O insurance carriers, alternative dispute resolution professionals, and investment professionals to make informed decisions related to potential exposure and liability stemming from corrective events. Subscribers across both platforms have access to sound and independent securities class action measures and metrics up to the point of requiring specialized expert consultation.  ​ SAR offers two distinct service platforms to subscribers. The Securities Class Action Data Analytics (SCADA) platform presents subscribers with objective data and verifiable analysis based on methodologies established by case precedents in the U.S. Federal Court system. The platform is tailor-made to serve key stakeholders in securities class action litigation with statistical and quantitative analysis on filed and proprietary cases for alleged violations of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The Insurance Carrier Class Action Data Analytics (ICCADA) platform presents subscribers with objective and real-time measures of risk and exposure for potential event-driven claims from alleged violations of the federal securities laws under Section 10(b) and 20(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
Headquarters Regions: Washington DC Metro Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: A cloud-based financial network for FX, cross-border payments, clearing, and settlement in real-time, within the same network, and 24x7x365.
Full Description: IsSettled is pioneering a new era in global finance with its API-based network, transforming the landscape for financial institutions and corporations worldwide. Our platform is a comprehensive solution, seamlessly connecting participants with their existing correspondent and payment networks. This creates an efficient channel of interaction that embraces innovative business models. Participants can directly exchange financial information leveraging the ISO 20022 standard, execute FX transactions across currencies, metals, and other assets, and engage in net and gross settlement for cross-border payments of any size. Our system is designed to facilitate mutual settlements with counterparties, provide and receive access to cross-liquidity, and ensure participants understand entirely their business operations. It is all made possible in real-time, within the same network, ensuring availability 24/7/365. IsSettled is more than a payment and settlement platform; it is a tokenization system and transaction ledger that revolutionizes financial transactions, offering unparalleled efficiency, security, and transparency. By enabling direct interaction and providing tools for comprehensive financial management, IsSettled empowers businesses to navigate the complexities of the global financial environment easily. As we expand our footprint in key financial markets, IsSettled invites investors, partners, and financial institutions to join us in this journey. Together, we’re not just participating in the financial industry but redefining it for the digital age.

Description: ARED is a infrastructure as a service company to help grow the digital economy in Africa.
Full Description: ARED Group Inc was founded in August 2020, we are building a distributed cloud infrastructure as a service company headquartered in the USA with subsidies in Rwanda, Uganda, and Nigeria. ARED started as a Research Lab in 2013, our goal was to help bridge the digital divide that affects over 4 billion people across the world. Most of the investment in the digital divide is focused on bandwidth, yet most of the storage and computing power is controlled by 3 main companies and centralized infrastructure is very expensive. Also, most of the smartphones in developing countries are low-end smartphones with low internal memory and low processing power that accentuate the digital divide. Finally, lack of energy access is a huge problem, if you do not have electricity at home you cannot charge your phone and use it the way you want, also building storage and computing power solution require energy that is why at ARED we use renewable energy.  To solve this digital divide, ARED developed a mini-server platform to store digital applications closer to the users and minimize the cost of the internet, and we developed a solar kiosk platform to power the technology but also provide additional services such as phone charging to become a one-stop-shop platform.  We spent 6 years developing the technology, and in 2020 we started piloting our technology in 6 African countries with local partners (Rwanda, Uganda, Nigeria, Ethiopia, Burkinafaso, and Ivory Coast).  ARED mission is simple, eliminate the digital divide across the world by building a distributed infrastructure closer to the users to minimize the digital access for users.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Atlanta Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Hardware, Internet Services, Mobile, Real Estate, Software, Sustainability
Top 5 Investors: Village Capital, Gray Matters Capital, VilCap Investments, Erick Yong

Description: USEncryption unlocks value from confidential data, while maintaining privacy and security.
Full Description: USEncryption unlocks value from confidential data, while maintaining privacy and security.  Privacy and security concerns require confidential data to be protected, typically locked in silos – they unintentionally block valuable, even life-saving insights. McKinsey estimates that open data could unlock up to $5 trillion in economic value per annum. We created and patented a new Privacy-Enhancing Technology to process encrypted data, and enable confidential data sharing. The data is shared in encrypted format to allow an untrusted party to extract insights without having to decrypt first. Use cases include training machine learning models on encrypted data, which could feed new AI models with bigger datasets, but not compromise the confidential data in them.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security
Founders: Claudio Chamon, Eduardo Mucciolo, Leandro Veltri, CFA

Only 3 other companies worldwide have approved products in this category (all legacy 'gas mask' designs for industrial use), and Canopy is poised to become the first with a clean-sheet design for use in healthcare. Our made-in-Vermont product exceeds all federal safety standards, we’re fulfilling DTC orders with an NPS score that smokes the competition, and through a strategic commercialization partnership, we have a B2B pipeline of the largest health systems in the US (and NHS in the UK) eager to pilot Canopy upon regulatory approval.
